text: AskBQ is BloombergQuint’s daily offering where market experts help investors make the right investment choice — be it in equities, commodities or the derivatives markets.On Wednesday’s episode, Gaurang Shah, head of market strategist at Geojit Financial Services and Sameet Chavan, chief analyst of technical and derivatives at Angel Broking gave their views on Tata Motors, Lupin, Infosys, BHEL, Eris Lifesciences.
title: How To Play Tata Motors, Lupin, Infosys, BHEL, Eris Lifesciences? #AskBQ
